ComicInfo.Summary:
ONE YEAR LATER. With the world seemingly at peace, things seem pretty all right on 34RTH until a strange ship's arrival sends D4VE head-first into an existential crisis: an inconceivable blast from the past that threatens not only D4VE's dwindling relationship with 5COTTY, but all of robot-kind itself!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Valentin Ramon | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Logan Faerber | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Brian Level (a) & Marissa Louise (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 23:55:50. [CVDB500315]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brian Level, Marissa Louise, Valentin Ramon
ComicInfo.Characters: 54LLY, 5COTTY, Audra, B3TH, BR4D, D4VE, FR3D, Gale, PNUT, ST3V3
